quran_verse.text_arabic: وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ
quran_verse.text_english: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].

hadith.text_english_summary: Prayer is the pillar of religion

notes: This hadith directly explains the practical implementation of the Quranic command to establish prayer. Ibn Kathir explicitly mentions this connection in his tafsir.
